content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 2, Villarreal 1.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 2, Villarreal 1.
Attempt blocked. Neymar (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Neymar (Barcelona) hits the bar with a right footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Sergi Roberto.
Attempt missed. Pedro (Barcelona) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Neymar with a through ball.
Foul by Ikechukwu Uche (Villarreal).
Jordi Alba (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Jaume Costa (Villarreal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Pedro (Barcelona).
Corner,  Villarreal. Conceded by Gerard Piqué.
Substitution, Barcelona. Sergi Roberto replaces Cesc Fàbregas.
Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jonathan Pereira (Villarreal).
Offside, Barcelona. Neymar tries a through ball, but Jordi Alba is caught offside.
Neymar (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Mario Gaspar.
Substitution, Barcelona. Pedro replaces Alexis Sánchez.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Sergio Asenjo.
Attempt saved. Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Alexis Sánchez.
Corner,  Villarreal. Conceded by Martín Montoya.
Substitution, Villarreal. Jonathan Pereira replaces Javier Aquino.
Attempt missed. Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Alexis Sánchez.
Attempt saved. Neymar (Barcelona) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Gerard Piqué.
Substitution, Villarreal. Bojan Jokic replaces Hernán Pérez.
Goal!  Barcelona 2, Villarreal 1. Neymar (Barcelona) right footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Alexis Sánchez.
Foul by Gerard Piqué (Barcelona).
Giovani dos Santos (Villarreal) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Substitution, Villarreal. Ikechukwu Uche replaces Edu Ramos.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Sergio Asenjo.
Attempt saved. Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Alexis Sánchez with a through ball.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Substitution, Barcelona. Xavi replaces Alexandre Song.
Delay in match Sergio Asenjo (Villarreal) because of an injury.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Chechu Dorado.
Foul by Tomás Pina (Villarreal).
Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Javier Aquino (Villarreal).
Corner,  Villarreal. Conceded by Gerard Piqué.
Attempt saved. Alexis Sánchez (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Marc Bartra.
Attempt missed. Giovani dos Santos (Villarreal) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Javier Aquino.
Offside, Barcelona. Gerard Piqué tries a through ball, but Alexis Sánchez is caught offside.
Goal!  Barcelona 1, Villarreal 1. Mateo Musacchio (Villarreal) header from the centre of the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Manu Trigueros with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Villarreal. Conceded by Martín Montoya.
Giovani dos Santos (Villarreal) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Marc Bartra (Barcelona).
Foul by Mario Gaspar (Villarreal).
Neymar (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Second Half begins Barcelona 1, Villarreal 0.
First Half ends, Barcelona 1, Villarreal 0.
Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mateo Musacchio (Villarreal).
Manu Trigueros (Villarreal) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Sergio Busquets (Barcelona).
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Sergio Asenjo.
Attempt saved. Alexis Sánchez (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Andrés Iniesta.
Manu Trigueros (Villarreal) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Neymar (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the right wing.

Foul by Alexis Sánchez (Barcelona).

Foul by Hernán Pérez (Villarreal).
Goal!  Barcelona 1, Villarreal 0. Neymar (Barcelona) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Penalty conceded by Mario Gaspar (Villarreal) with a hand ball in the penalty area.
Foul by Javier Aquino (Villarreal).
Jordi Alba (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt blocked. Manu Trigueros (Villarreal) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Javier Aquino.

Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Hernán Pérez (Villarreal).
Alexandre Song (Barcelona) hits the right post with a right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Mateo Musacchio.
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
